entries.name: prefix
entries.desc: The prefix for this Notifier, which is appended to all objects being inspected during output.

entries.name: exec_if()
entries.desc: Execute the given block if notifications are enabled.

entries.name: notify?()
entries.desc: A wrapper method used to determine whether notifications are enabled.

entries.name: pp(*objs)
entries.desc: Same as ppx, except it uses the prefix given during object initialization. See IRB::OutputMethod#ppx for more detail.

entries.name: ppx(prefix, *objs)
entries.desc: Same as pp, except it concatenates the given prefix with the prefix given during object initialization.
